item.title: Fitness 4 Free - The Project
item.description: Fitness 4 Free is free. Fitness 4 Free doesn’t sell workout or coaching services. Fitness 4 Free allows you to train with the best programs and workouts of the moment. Fitness 4 Free’s vision For years the fitness world has been trapped by poor content, workout programs that do not guarantee a result and incompetent trainers in annual programming. Every year we find advertisements pushing a new training method making the previous one obsolete, trainers boasting results achieved through their training methods and often disguised by photo retouching or the use of substances.
